properties.description: A sample API with information related to a technical conference.  The available resources  include *Speakers*, *Sessions* and *Topics*.  A single write operation is available to provide  feedback on a session.
Retreive a representation of a single session by Id
A list of sessions.  Optional parameters work as filters to reduce the listed sessions.
A list of topics covered by a particular session
Retreive a representation of a single session by Id
